txt.en: A horn sounds. The enemy has been alerted to your presence!
'My people are retreating as we speak, but the Easterlings are closer than we thought.'
'These are women and children. They will not make it unless we buy them some time.'
'This is my fight for my people. Your battle will come soon enough I fear.'
'Make sure they get to the safety of the Lonely Mountain.'
'If you wish to fight, I will not deny your aid. We must buy as much time as possible, no matter the cost.'
'Then we shall do so my friend. My axe and your sword, side by side one last time.'
'I will see you again soon, my friend, in this life or the next.'
'This crossing must be held if my people are to survive.'
